FuncDef: The display msdp invalid-packet verbose command displays details about received invalid Multicast Source Discovery Protocol (MSDP) messages.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays details about a specified number of latest received invalid MSDP messages.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 100. By default, the command displays details about all received invalid MSDP messages.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the command output contains statistics about invalid MSDP messages, run the display msdp invalid-packet packet-number verbose command to view details about invalid MSDP messages to locate faults.
Before using the display msdp invalid-packet command, If verbose are specified, the command displays details about latest received invalid MSDP messages.
